definitions.definition: A Muslim scholar and interpreter of sharia law , who can deliver a fatwa .
A civilian dress when worn by a member of the military , or casual dress when worn by a pupil of a school who normally would wear uniform .

main_definition: ( countable , Islam ) A Muslim scholar and interpreter of sharia law , who can deliver a fatwa .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable , Australia , British , New Zealand ) A civilian dress when worn by a member of the military , or casual dress when worn by a pupil of a school who normally would wear uniform .
